patthana23.3:4.1: Nakusalo naupādinnupādāniyo dhammo abyākatassa upādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … cha pañhā.
patthana23.3:4.4: Ārammaṇe cha, anantare samanantare upanissaye cha, purejāte tīṇi, kamme pañca, āhāre tīṇi, atthiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana23.3:5.1: Nakusalaṃ naanupādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.3:5.3: Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana23.3:6.1: Nakusalaṃ naanupādinnaanupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo anupādinnaanupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.3:6.3: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe cha … pe … āsevane tīṇi … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
